item.title: About
item.description: Hello, I’m redshiftzero. Google Scholar Twitter GitHub Youtube Professional Experience Freedom of the Press Foundation Principal Research Engineer, July 2020 - present SecureDrop Lead Developer, July 2017 - June 2020 Ford-Mozilla Open Web Fellow, September 2016 - June 2017 Center for Data Science and Public Policy Postdoctoral Researcher, September 2015 - September 2016 Data Science for Social Good Technical Mentor, June 2016 - August 2016 Data Science for Social Good Fellow, June 2015 - August 2015

item.title: Site notice
